subject: Basketball
Traffic Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: The former N.B.A. All-Star Mookie Blaylock was charged with vehicular homicide in a head-on crash in suburban Atlanta that killed a 43-year-old woman.
snippet: The former N.B.A. All-Star Mookie Blaylock was charged with vehicular homicide in a head-on crash in suburban Atlanta that killed a 43-year-old woman.
